Definition at line 123 of file N_LinkInitiator.h.

Field Documentation

void(* N_LinkInitiator_Callback_t::GroupAddressesAssigned)(uint16_t groupIdFirst, uint16_t groupIdLast)

Indication that the device has been assigned group adresses.

Parameters:
groupIdFirstThe first group identifier assigned to the device during linking. Zero if no groups where assigned
groupIdLastThe last group identifier assigned to the device during linking. Zero if no groups where assigned
